DOC.brief_title: Heartbeat Sensitivity Calibration Using ECG Accessory
DOC.detailed_description: This observational , un-blinded , non-significant risk , non-interventional study design collect ECG data least one subject pool three ( 3 ) healthy male subject one clinical site ( Clinical Trials Texas ) . If acceptable data acquire one ( 1 ) subject remain subject enter study . Three ( 3 ) six ( 6 ) researcher record data , direct contact subject do study coordinator principal investigator ( PI ) . The purpose study validate Heartbeat Sensitivity calibration process utilize Cyberonics ECG Accessory . The non-invasive , passive collection ECG signal rest healthy subject use validate use ECG Accessory Model 201 Programming Wand , Model 250 VNS Programming Software Version 9.0 , Model 106 Generator , ECG monitor ( DRE True ECG-12 ) , well associate Instructions Use . The data generate exercise use future clinical trial utilizing device .
